duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage vendor, partner, and relationship activities, with a focus on risk oversight and compliance.
Utilize MS Office packages to support project management and departmental procedures.
Engage in client management and focus on delivering quality project management services.
Understand and adhere to banking procedures, functions, and activities to ensure compliance and efficiency.
Partner with internal stakeholders and external vendors to deliver initiatives and prioritize customer experience.
Negotiate scope, cost management, and contractual language with vendors and partners.
Communicate and drive the strategic direction of the firm, delivering technology solutions that meet internal and external needs.
Analyze business processes, identify risks, and propose solutions to drive efficiencies and engagement.
Promote a strong controls environment and adhere to risk/control, procedure, and process expectations.
Support teams and partners as needed to move the business forward and achieve set goals.
